summary: The implementation successfully delivers the match-three tile game with Pokecoin rewards, shiny female Pokemon discovery, payout calculation, and Game tab navigation. All core gameplay mechanics, backend integration, and UI components are present. However, the required Pokemon tile image assets are not referenced in the diff, creating uncertainty about image implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Game board displays Pokemon-themed tiles using the required image assets (pokemon-tiles.dim_512x512.png)
missing_requirements.reason: GameTile.tsx uses color-coded tiles with text abbreviations instead of the requested Pokemon tile sprites. No references to pokemon-tiles.dim_512x512.png found in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Shiny female Pokemon tiles should use special shiny female Pokemon tile sprites (shiny-female-tiles.dim_512x512.png)
missing_requirements.reason: GameTile.tsx renders shiny tiles with sparkle icons and glow effects but does not reference the requested shiny-female-tiles.dim_512x512.png image asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Payout records are automatically created when thresholds are met
missing_requirements.reason: GamePayoutSummary.tsx shows conversion calculations and progress toward thresholds, but no evidence of automatic payout record creation via useLogPayout mutation when thresholds are reached.
